00126 void eigensymm_obsolete
00127 (
00128         const Array2D< double >& amatA,
00129         Array2D< double >& vmatA,
00130         Array  < double >& dvecA
00131 )
00132 {
00133         SIZE_CHECK( amatA.dim( 0 ) == amatA.dim( 1 ) )
00134         vmatA.resize( amatA );
00135         dvecA.resize( amatA.dim( 0 ) );
00136 
00137         const unsigned maxIterC = 50;
00138 
00139         double **const x = amatA.ptrArr( );
00140         double **a = vmatA.ptrArr( );
00141         double *d = dvecA.elemvec( );
00142         unsigned n = dvecA.nelem( );
00143 
00144     unsigned i, j, k, l, m;
00145     double   b, c, f, g, h, hh, p, r, s, scale, *e, tmp;
00146 
00147     //
00148     // special case n = 1
00149     //
00150     if( n == 1 )
00151         {
00152         a[ 0 ][ 0 ] = 1;
00153                 d[ 0 ] = x[ 0 ][ 0 ];
00154                 return;
00155     }
00156 
00157     //
00158     // copy matrix
00159     //
00160     for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00161         {
00162         for( j = 0; j <= i; j++ )
00163                 {
00164                         a [i] [j] = x [i] [j];
00165                 }
00166         }
00167     tmp = x[ n-1 ][ n-1 ];
00168     e   = x[ n-1 ];
00169 
00170     //
00171     // reduction to tridiagonal form
00172     //
00173     for( i = n; i-- > 1; )
00174     {
00175         h = scale = 0.0;
00176 
00177         if( i > 1 )
00178                 {
00179             // scale row
00180             for( k = 0; k < i; k++ )
00181                         {
00182                 scale += fabs( a [i] [k] );
00183                         }
00184                 }
00185 
00186         if( scale == 0.0 )
00187                 {
00188             e [i] = a [i] [i-1];
00189                 }
00190         else
00191         {
00192             for( k = 0; k < i; k++ )
00193             {
00194                 a [i] [k] /= scale;
00195                 h += a [i] [k] * a [i] [k];
00196             }
00197 
00198             f           = a [i] [i-1];
00199             g           = f > 0 ? -sqrt( h ) : sqrt( h );
00200             e [i]       = scale * g;
00201             h          -= f * g;
00202             a [i] [i-1] = f - g;
00203             f           = 0.0;
00204 
00205             for( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00206             {
00207                 a [j] [i] = a [i] [j] / (scale * h );
00208                 g = 0.0;
00209 
00210                 // form element of a*u
00211                 for( k = 0; k <= j; k++ )
00212                                 {
00213                     g += a [j] [k] * a [i] [k];
00214                                 }
00215 
00216                 for( k = j + 1; k < i; k++ )
00217                                 {
00218                     g += a [k] [j] * a [i] [k];
00219                                 }
00220 
00221                 // form element of p
00222                 f += ( e [j] = g / h ) * a [i] [j];
00223             }
00224 
00225             hh = f / (h + h );
00226 
00227             // form reduced a
00228             for( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00229             {
00230                 f     = a [i] [j];
00231                 g     = e [j] - hh * f;
00232                 e [j] = g;
00233 
00234                 for( k = 0; k <= j; k++ )
00235                                 {
00236                     a [j] [k] -= f * e [k] + g * a [i] [k];
00237                                 }
00238             }
00239 
00240             for( k = i; k--; )
00241                         {
00242                 a [i] [k] *= scale;
00243                         }
00244         }
00245 
00246         d [i] = h;
00247     }
00248 
00249     d [0] = e [0] = 0.0;
00250 
00251     // accumulation of transformation matrices
00252     for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00253     {
00254         if( d [i] )
00255         {
00256             for( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00257             {
00258                 g = 0.0;
00259 
00260                 for( k = 0; k < i; k++ )
00261                                 {
00262                     g += a [i] [k] * a [k] [j];
00263                                 }
00264 
00265                 for( k = 0; k < i; k++ )
00266                                 {
00267                     a [k] [j] -= g * a [k] [i];
00268                                 }
00269             }
00270         }
00271 
00272         d [i]     = a [i] [i];
00273         a [i] [i] = 1.0;
00274 
00275         for( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00276                 {
00277             a [i] [j] = a [j] [i] = 0.0;
00278                 }
00279     }
00280 
00281         //
00282         // eigenvalues from tridiagonal form
00283         //
00284     if( n <= 1 )
00285         {
00286                 return;
00287         }
00288 
00289     for( i = 1; i < n; i++ )
00290         {
00291         e [i-1] = e [i];
00292         }
00293 
00294     e [n-1] = 0.0;
00295 
00296     for( l = 0; l < n; l++ )
00297     {
00298         j = 0;
00299 
00300         do
00301         {
00302             // look for small sub-diagonal element
00303             for( m = l; m < n-1; m++ )
00304             {
00305                 s = fabs( d [m] ) + fabs( d [m+1] );
00306                 if( fabs( e [m] ) + s == s )
00307                                 {
00308                                         break;
00309                                 }
00310             }
00311 
00312             p = d [l];
00313 
00314             if( m != l )
00315             {
00316                 if( j++ == maxIterC )
00317                                 {
00318                                         throw 1;
00319                                 }
00320 
00321                 // form shift
00322                 g = (d [l+1] - p ) / (2.0 * e [l] );
00323                 r = sqrt( g * g + 1.0 );
00324                 g = d [m] - p + e [l] / (g + ((g ) > 0 ? fabs(r ) : -fabs(r )));
00325                 s = c = 1.0;
00326                 p = 0.0;
00327 
00328                 for( i = m; i-- > l; )
00329                 {
00330                     f = s * e [i];
00331                     b = c * e [i];
00332 
00333                     if( fabs( f ) >= fabs( g ) )
00334                     {
00335                         c       = g / f;
00336                         r       = sqrt( c * c + 1.0 );
00337                         e [i+1] = f * r;
00338                         s       = 1.0 / r;
00339                         c      *= s;
00340                     }
00341                     else
00342                     {
00343                         s       = f / g;
00344                         r       = sqrt( s * s + 1.0 );
00345                         e [i+1] = g * r;
00346                         c       = 1.0 / r;
00347                         s      *= c;
00348                     }
00349 
00350                     g       = d [i+1] - p;
00351                     r       = (d [i] - g ) * s + 2.0 * c * b;
00352                     p       = s * r;
00353                     d [i+1] = g + p;
00354                     g       = c * r - b;
00355 
00356                     // form vector
00357                     for( k = 0; k < n; k++ )
00358                     {
00359                         f           = a [k] [i+1];
00360                         a [k] [i+1] = s * a [k] [i] + c * f;
00361                         a [k] [i  ] = c * a [k] [i] - s * f;
00362                     }
00363                 }
00364 
00365                 d [l] -= p;
00366                 e [l]  = g;
00367                 e [m]  = 0.0;
00368             }
00369         }
00370         while( m != l );
00371     }
00372 
00373         //
00374         // sorting eigenvalues
00375         //
00376     eigensort( vmatA, dvecA );
00377 
00378         //
00379         // normalizing eigenvectors
00380         //
00381     for( j = n; j--; )
00382     {
00383         s = 0.0;
00384         for( i = n; i--; )
00385                 {
00386                         s += a [i] [j] * a [i] [j];
00387                 }
00388         s = sqrt( s );
00389 
00390         for( i = n; i--; )
00391                 {
00392                         a [i] [j] /= s;
00393                 }
00394     }
00395 
00396     x [n-1] [n-1] = tmp;
00397 }

00434 void eigensymm_obsolete
00435 (
00436     const Array< double >& A,
00437           Array< double >& G,
00438           Array< double >& l
00439 )
00440 {
00441     SIZE_CHECK( A.ndim( ) == 2 && A.dim( 0 ) == A.dim( 1 ) )
00442 
00443         G.resize( A );
00444         l.resize( A.dim( 0 ) );
00445 
00446         Array2DReference< double > amatL( const_cast< Array< double >& >( A ) );
00447         Array2DReference< double > vmatL( G );
00448 
00449     eigensymm_obsolete( amatL, vmatL, l );
00450 }

00632 {
00633     SIZE_CHECK( amatA.dim( 0 ) == amatA.dim( 1 ) )
00634

00636     dvecA.resize( amatA.dim( 0 ) );
00637     odvecA.resize( amatA.dim( 0 ) );
00638 
00639     const unsigned maxIterC = 50;
00640 
00641     double **const x = amatA.ptrArr( );
00642     double **a = vmatA.ptrArr( );
00643     double *e = odvecA.elemvec( );
00644     double *d = dvecA.elemvec( );
00645     unsigned n = dvecA.nelem( );
00646

00648     double   b, c, f, g, h, hh, p, r, s, scale;

00650     //
00651     // special case n = 1
00652     //
00653     if( n == 1 )
00654         {
00655         a[ 0 ][ 0 ] = 1;
00656                 d[ 0 ] = x[ 0 ][ 0 ];
00657                 return;
00658     }
00659 
00660     //
00661     // copy matrix
00662     //
00663     for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00664         {
00665         for( j = 0; j <= i; j++ )
00666                 {
00667                         a [i] [j] = x [i] [j];
00668                 }
00669         }
00670  
00671     //
00672     // reduction to tridiagonal form
00673     //
00674     for( i = n; i-- > 1; )
00675     {
00676         h = scale = 0.0;
00677 
00678         if( i > 1 )
00679                 {
00680             // scale row
00681             for( k = 0; k < i; k++ )
00682                         {
00683                 scale += fabs( a [i] [k] );
00684                         }
00685                 }
00686 
00687         if( scale == 0.0 )
00688                 {
00689             e [i] = a [i] [i-1];
00690                 }
00691         else
00692         {
00693             for( k = 0; k < i; k++ )
00694             {
00695                 a [i] [k] /= scale;
00696                 h += a [i] [k] * a [i] [k];
00697             }
00698 
00699             f           = a [i] [i-1];
00700             g           = f > 0 ? -sqrt( h ) : sqrt( h );
00701             e [i]       = scale * g;
00702             h          -= f * g;
00703             a [i] [i-1] = f - g;
00704             f           = 0.0;
00705 
00706             for( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00707             {
00708                 a [j] [i] = a [i] [j] / (scale * h );
00709                 g = 0.0;
00710 
00711                 // form element of a*u
00712                 for( k = 0; k <= j; k++ )
00713                                 {
00714                     g += a [j] [k] * a [i] [k];
00715                                 }
00716 
00717                 for( k = j + 1; k < i; k++ )
00718                                 {
00719                     g += a [k] [j] * a [i] [k];
00720                                 }
00721 
00722                 // form element of p
00723                 f += ( e [j] = g / h ) * a [i] [j];
00724             }
00725 
00726             hh = f / (h + h );
00727 
00728             // form reduced a
00729             for( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00730             {
00731                 f     = a [i] [j];
00732                 g     = e [j] - hh * f;
00733                 e [j] = g;
00734 
00735                 for( k = 0; k <= j; k++ )
00736                                 {
00737                     a [j] [k] -= f * e [k] + g * a [i] [k];
00738                                 }
00739             }
00740 
00741             for( k = i; k--; )
00742                         {
00743                 a [i] [k] *= scale;
00744                         }
00745         }
00746 
00747         d [i] = h;
00748     }
00749 
00750     d [0] = e [0] = 0.0;
00751 
00752     // accumulation of transformation matrices
00753     for( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00754     {
00755         if( d [i] )
00756         {
00757             for( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00758             {
00759                 g = 0.0;
00760 
00761                 for( k = 0; k < i; k++ )
00762                                 {
00763                     g += a [i] [k] * a [k] [j];
00764                                 }
00765 
00766                 for( k = 0; k < i; k++ )
00767                                 {
00768                     a [k] [j] -= g * a [k] [i];
00769                                 }
00770             }
00771         }
00772 
00773         d [i]     = a [i] [i];
00774         a [i] [i] = 1.0;
00775 
00776         for( j = 0; j < i; j++ )
00777                 {
00778             a [i] [j] = a [j] [i] = 0.0;
00779                 }
00780     }
00781 
00782         //
00783         // eigenvalues from tridiagonal form
00784         //
00785     if( n <= 1 )
00786         {
00787                 return;
00788         }
00789 
00790     for( i = 1; i < n; i++ )
00791         {
00792         e [i-1] = e [i];
00793         }
00794 
00795     e [n-1] = 0.0;
00796 
00797     for( l = 0; l < n; l++ )
00798     {
00799         j = 0;
00800 
00801         do
00802         {
00803             // look for small sub-diagonal element
00804             for( m = l; m < n-1; m++ )
00805             {
00806                 s = fabs( d [m] ) + fabs( d [m+1] );
00807                 if( fabs( e [m] ) + s == s )
00808                                 {
00809                                         break;
00810                                 }
00811             }
00812 
00813             p = d [l];
00814 
00815             if( m != l )
00816             {
00817                 if( j++ == maxIterC )
00818                                 {
00819                                         throw 1;
00820                                 }
00821 
00822                 // form shift
00823                 g = (d [l+1] - p ) / (2.0 * e [l] );
00824                 r = sqrt( g * g + 1.0 );
00825                 g = d [m] - p + e [l] / (g + ((g ) > 0 ? fabs(r ) : -fabs(r )));
00826                 s = c = 1.0;
00827                 p = 0.0;
00828 
00829                 for( i = m; i-- > l; )
00830                 {
00831                     f = s * e [i];
00832                     b = c * e [i];
00833 
00834                     if( fabs( f ) >= fabs( g ) )
00835                     {
00836                         c       = g / f;
00837                         r       = sqrt( c * c + 1.0 );
00838                         e [i+1] = f * r;
00839                         s       = 1.0 / r;
00840                         c      *= s;
00841                     }
00842                     else
00843                     {
00844                         s       = f / g;
00845                         r       = sqrt( s * s + 1.0 );
00846                         e [i+1] = g * r;
00847                         c       = 1.0 / r;
00848                         s      *= c;
00849                     }
00850 
00851                     g       = d [i+1] - p;
00852                     r       = (d [i] - g ) * s + 2.0 * c * b;
00853                     p       = s * r;
00854                     d [i+1] = g + p;
00855                     g       = c * r - b;
00856 
00857                     // form vector
00858                     for( k = 0; k < n; k++ )
00859                     {
00860                         f           = a [k] [i+1];
00861                         a [k] [i+1] = s * a [k] [i] + c * f;
00862                         a [k] [i  ] = c * a [k] [i] - s * f;
00863                     }
00864                 }
00865 
00866                 d [l] -= p;
00867                 e [l]  = g;
00868                 e [m]  = 0.0;
00869             }
00870         }
00871         while( m != l );
00872     }
00873 
00874         //
00875         // sorting eigenvalues
00876         //
00877     eigensort( vmatA, dvecA );
00878 
00879         //
00880         // normalizing eigenvectors
00881         //
00882     for( j = n; j--; )
00883     {
00884         s = 0.0;
00885         for( i = n; i--; )
00886                 {
00887                         s += a [i] [j] * a [i] [j];
00888                 }
00889         s = sqrt( s );
00890 
00891         for( i = n; i--; )
00892                 {
00893                         a [i] [j] /= s;
00894                 }
00895     }

00936 void eigensymm
00937 (
00938     const Array< double >& A,
00939           Array< double >& G,
00940           Array< double >& l,
00941           Array< double >& od
00942 )
00943 {
00944     SIZE_CHECK( A.ndim( ) == 2 && A.dim( 0 ) == A.dim( 1 ) )
00945 
00946         G.resize( A );
00947         l.resize( A.dim( 0 ) );
00948         od.resize( A.dim( 0 ) );
00949 
00950         Array2DReference< double > amatL( const_cast< Array< double >& >( A ) );
00951         Array2DReference< double > vmatL( G );
00952 
00953     eigensymm( amatL, vmatL, l, od);
00954 }
